entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Mar 25 - Mar 31, 2024
entry.content:
Game Engines / Commercial

  • ğŸ’¸ PlayCanvas - Popular (Flappy Bird) WebGL game engine. [Awesome (â­301) | GitHub (â­10k)]

Game Engines / Specialty

  • ğŸ’¸ DopeFish - Doom / Heretic map loading system for GameMaker.

Learning / Computer Graphics

  • Graphics API: Mantle
    • ğŸ“š Mantle - Developed by AMD as an alternative to Direct3D and OpenGL.
  • Graphics API: Metal
    • ğŸŒ Metal - API for developing 3D apps on Apple platforms. [Samples]
    • ğŸ“š Metal Tutorial - Learn how to get started with Metal at RayWenderlich.com.
  • Graphics API: WebGPU
    • ğŸŒ Dawn - Open source, cross-platform implementation of the WebGPU standard, by Google.
    • ğŸŒ WebGPU (â­5.1k) - Next generation web 3D graphics API. [GitHub (â­5.1k)]
    • ğŸŒ WebGPU Demos - Collection of simple WebGPU examples by Apple.

Learning / Engine Development

  • Commercial Studios Research Divisions
    • ğŸŒ Activision Research - Blog posts, articles and presentations from research within Activision.
    • ğŸŒ EA Technology - Research on game tech including info on the Frostbite engine.
    • ğŸŒ Ubisoft Technology - Learn about in-house tech including the Anvil and Snowdrop engines.

Libraries / C

  • C: Graphics - 3D
    • ğŸ‰ Sokol Gfx (â­8.4k) - Cross-platform, single-file graphics. [Examples]
    • ğŸ‰ Sokol Graphics Painter (â­517) - 2D graphics painter implemented with Sokol.
  • C: Input
    • ğŸ‰ libGamepad (â­24) - Cross-platform library for gamepad input.
    • ğŸ‰ Sokol Gamepad (â­8.4k) - Branch with addon support for gamepads in Sokol.
  • C: Math
    • ğŸ‰ Cglm (â­2.6k) - Highly optimized OpenGL math.
    • â­ Handmade Math (â­1.4k) ğŸ”¥ - Simple, public domain math library for games and computer graphics.
    • ğŸ‰ Kazmath (â­531) - Math library targeted at games.
    • ğŸ‰ Raymath (â­27k) - Math library included in the RayLib game framework.

Libraries / C++

  • C++: File System
    • ğŸ‰ Imgui-Filebrowser (â­755) - Header-only file browser implementation for Dear ImGui in C++17.
  • C++: Game Engine w/Editor
    • ğŸ‰ AnKi 3D Engine (â­1.5k) - Vulkan backend, modern renderer, scripting, physics and more.
    • ğŸ”’ Crown Engine (â­2.2k) - Data-driven 3D and 2D game engine.
    • ğŸ‰ Crystal Engine (â­190) - Vulkan backend with PBR and styled GUI (CrystalWidgets).
    • ğŸ‰ Drop Creator (â­7) - No code, 2.5D game engine built with Qt, OpenGL and Chipmunk Physics.
    • ğŸ”’ Enigma (â­357) - GameMaker compatible 2D engine.
    • ğŸ‰ Esoterica Engine (â­984) - High-performance game engine with editor and AAA quality animation graph.
    • ğŸ‰ Ethereal Engine (â­711) - Cross-platform game engine and editor.
    • ğŸ‰ ezEngine (â­1.7k) - Game engine in active development.
    • ğŸ‰ FIFE (â­565) - Multi-platform isometric game engine.
    • ğŸ‰ Irrlicht - Cross-platform 3D engine worked on for nearly 2 decades. [Website]
    • ğŸ‰ Limon Engine (â­654) - 3D FPS game engine with full dynamic lighting and shadows.
    • ğŸ‰ Lina Engine (â­867) - Modular game engine, aimed to develop 3D desktop games.
    • ğŸ‰ Lumos (â­1.4k) - Cross-platform 2D/3D game engine, supports both OpenGL and Vulkan.
    • ğŸ‰ Lumix Engine (â­3.6k) - A 3D game engine with Dear ImGui based editor.
    • ğŸ‰ MxEngine (â­1.2k) - Modern-C++ general-purpose 3D game engine.
    • ğŸ”’ neoGFX (â­560) - Cross-platform app and game engine.
    • ğŸ‰ Ã–bEngine (â­840) - 2D engine with Lua scripting built with SFML.
    • ğŸ‰ Overload (â­2.3k) - Well documented 3D game engine inspired by industry standards.
    • ğŸ‰ Razix Engine (â­492) - High-performance research engine for production pipeline.

    • ğŸ‰ Spartan Engine (â­2.5k) - Emphasis on quality and performance.
    • ğŸ‰ Torque 3D (â­3.4k) - High-performance 3D engine built on The Forge.

  • C++: Graphics - 2D

    • ğŸ‰ C++ Bitmap Library (â­175) - Featured bitmap loading and manipulation library.

    • ğŸ‰ Skia (â­9.9k) - Complete 2D graphics library used in Chrome by Google. [Website]

  • C++: Input
    • ğŸ‰ Gainput (â­875) - Easy to use input library.

  • C++: Libraries
    • ğŸ‰ Boost Libraries - Wide range of C++ libraries, many end up as part of the STL. [Website]

Libraries / C#

  • C#: Cross-Platform

Libraries / Go

  • ğŸŒ Go - Statically typed, compiled programming language designed at Google. [GitHub]

Libraries / Haxe

Libraries / Java

  • ğŸ“š OpenGL & GLSL Tutorials (â­1.9k) - OpenGL / GLSL tutorials for LWJGL and libGDX.

Libraries / JavaScript

  • JavaScript: Animation
    • ğŸ‰ Animate.css (â­82k) - Ready-to-use, pure CSS animations. [Examples]
    • ğŸ‰ D3.js (â­111k) - Data-Driven Documents. Bring data to life with SVG, canvas and HTML. [Examples | Website]
    • ğŸ’¸ GreenSock (â­22k) - Robust animation toolset. [Website]
    • ğŸ‰ Ossos (â­451) - Web-based character animation system.
    • ğŸ‰ React-Spring (â­29k) - Spring physics based React animation library.
    • ğŸ‰ Scene.js (â­2.8k) - JavaScript & CSS timeline-based animation library.
    • ğŸ‰ Theatre (â­12k) - Motion design editor for the web.
    • ğŸ‰ Tween.js (â­10k) - Tweening engine for easy animations using Robert Penner's equations.
    • ğŸ‰ TweenJS (â­3.6k) - Tweening / animation library, part of the CreateJS suite.
  • JavaScript: Game Engine w/Editor
    • ğŸ‰ A-Frame (â­17k) - Web framework for building VR experiences. [Website]
    • ğŸ‰ Cocos Creator (â­8.8k) - Cross-Platform 2D/3D game creation. [Website]

Libraries / Kotlin

  • Kotlin: Game Framework
    • ğŸ‰ FXGL (â­4.6k) - Game library for 2D, experimental 3D.

Libraries / Rust

  • Rust: Game Framework

Specialty Topics / Geometry

Specialty Topics / Transparency

entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Nov 06 - Nov 12, 2023
entry.content:
Game Engines / Awesome Collections

  • ğŸ“š CoolEngines (â­88) - List of open source graphic & game engines.

Libraries / C++

  • C++: Audio
    • ğŸ‰ Amplitude Audio SDK (â­53) - Cross-platform audio engine designed for the needs of games.
    • ğŸ’° irrKlang - High level 2D/3D sound engine and audio library.
    • ğŸ’° Juce (â­7.4k) - The leading framework for multi-platform audio apps.
    • ğŸ”’ OpenAL Soft (â­2.4k) - Software implementation of the OpenAL 3D audio API.
    • ğŸ‰ PortAudio (â­1.8k) - Cross-platform audio library.
  • C++: Physics
    • ğŸ‰ Box2D (â­8.9k) - Battle tested 2D physics for games. [Docs | Fixed Time-Step | Tutorials]
    • ğŸ‰ Bullet Physics (â­14k) - Popular 3D physics libary.
    • ğŸ‰ Chrono (â­2.5k) - High-performance multiphysics and multibody dynamics simulations. [Gallery]
    • ğŸ‰ Edyn (â­703) - Multi-threaded, networked physics engine. Supports large dynamic worlds. [Testbed (â­39)]
    • ğŸ‰ Jolt Physics (â­8.1k) - Multi-core friendly rigid body 3D physics and collision detection.
    • ğŸ‰ Liquid Fun (â­4.8k) - Extension of Box2D, adds particle-based fluid and soft bodies. [Demos]
    • ğŸ‰ Newton Dynamics (â­990) - Real-time simulation of 3D environments.
    • ğŸ‰ ODE - Open Dynamics Engine, 3D rigid body physics.
    • ğŸ‰ Qu3e (â­958) - Fast 3D physics engine, created to be used in games.
    • ğŸ‰ ReactPhysics3D (â­1.6k) - 3D physics engine.
    • ğŸ‰ Slingshot (â­130) - Constraint-based physics engine for 3D rigid body dynamics.

entry.content:
Game Engines / Popular

Game Engines / AAA

Game Engines / Commercial

  • ğŸ’¸ GameMaker Studio - Popular 2D game development environment by YoYo Games.
  • ğŸ’° Phaser Editor 2D - Commercial, web-based editor for Phaser. [GitHub (â­467)]

Game Engines / Specialty

  • ğŸ‰ GB Studio (â­8.9k) - Retro adventure game creator for Game Boy.
  • ğŸ’° Platforming Engine - Everything you need to create your own platformer in GameMaker.
  • ğŸ’° RPG in a Box - Turn your stories and ideas into games, built with Godot.

Libraries / BASIC

Libraries / C

    • ğŸ‰ MiniFB (â­1.1k) - Creates a cross-platform frame buffer for drawing pixels.
    • ğŸ‰ SDL (â­13k) ğŸ”¥ - Low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware.
    • ğŸ‰ Sokol (â­8.4k) ğŸ”¥ - Single-file libraries for graphics, windowing, file handling, audio and more.
  • C: Audio

entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Jan 09 - Jan 15, 2023
entry.content:
Game Engines / Awesome Collections

  • ğŸ“š Wikipedia: List of Game Engines - Game engines along with their platforms and licenses.

Game Engines / AAA

  • ğŸ’° C4 Engine - Modern console engine.
  • ğŸ’° Gamebryo - Complete toolset, flexible workflow, rapid prototyping.
  • ğŸ’¸ Unigine - Real-time 3D engine. Photorealistic graphics, large virtual worlds, C++ and C# API.

Game Engines / Commercial

  • ğŸ’¸ Buildbox - Create 3D & 2D video games without coding.
  • ğŸ’¸ GameSalad - Sophisticated visual programming interface.
  • ğŸ’¸ MANU - Unique animation system helps you create games without coding.
  • ğŸ’¸ Roblox - Create immersive 3D experiences with Lua scripting.
  • ğŸ’¸ Simulation Starter Kit - Create interactive 3D apps across a range of platforms.

Game Engines / Specialty

  • ğŸ”’ HARFANG 3D (â­620) - 3D visualization library for industry professionals, usable in C++, Python, Lua, Go.
  • ğŸ’° RPG Maker - Create an original role-playing game without any specialized knowledge.

Learning / Computer Graphics

  • Blog Articles
    • ğŸ“š Comparison of Modern Graphics APIs - Modern graphics APIs vs older APIs.
    • ğŸ“š GPU Performance for Game Artists - Common art-related performance issues.
  • Graphics API: DirectX
    • ğŸŒ DirectX - Microsoft API used to create 2D/3D games and apps. [Blog | Samples (â­6.5k)]
    • ğŸ“š DirectXTutorial.com - Older resource with lots of tutorials on DirectX versions 9 & 11.
  • Graphics API: OpenGL
    • ğŸ“š LearnOpenGL ğŸ”¥ - Incredible! In depth tutorials for modern graphics programming.
    • ğŸŒ Mesa 3D - Open source implementations of OpenGL.
    • ğŸŒ OpenGL - The industry's foundation for high-performance graphics.
    • ğŸ“š OpenGL Tutorial - Collection of OpenGL tutorials with source code examples.
  • Graphics API: Vulkan
    • ğŸŒ Vulkan - Modern cross-platform graphics API. [Samples (â­4.8k)]
    • ğŸ“š Vulkan Tutorial - Teaches the basics of using Vulkan graphics and compute API.
  • Graphics API: WebGL
    • ğŸŒ WebGL - Open web standard 3D graphics API. [GitHub (â­2.7k)]
    • ğŸ“š WebGL Fundamentals ğŸ”¥ - Full understanding of what WebGL really is and how it works.
    • ğŸ“š WebGL 2 Fundamentals - Updated to use the WebGL2 standard.
    • ğŸ“š WebGL 2 Samples (â­1k) - Short and easy to understand samples demonstrating WebGL 2 features.
    • ğŸ“š WebGL Tutorial - How to use the canvas element to draw WebGL graphics.

Learning / Engine Development

  • Blog Articles
    • ğŸ“š How to Become a Game Engine Developer - Starting point on game engine development.
  • Books
    • ğŸ“š Game Engine Architecture - Theory and practice of game engine development.

Learning / Game Development

    • ğŸ“š GameDev-Resources (â­4.3k) - Wonderful list of game development resources.
    • ğŸ“š Magictools (â­15k) - List of game development resources to make magic happen.
    • ğŸŒ Web Game Dev - Resources on techniques and tools around JavaScript game development.
  • Books
    • ğŸ“š Art of Game Design - Teaches game design in an accessible manner.
    • ğŸ“š Game Programming Patterns - Patterns found in games that make code easier to understand.
  • Developer Portals
    • ğŸŒ Game Developer - Industry blogs, events, jobs, updates and more. Formerly Gamasutra.
    • ğŸŒ GameDev.net - Game dev forums, tutorials, blogs, projects, portfolios, and news.
    • ğŸŒ GameFromScratch.com - Game dev news, tutorials and much more.

  • Education Portals

Learning / Programming

  • ğŸŒ Geeks for Geeks - Tutorials, articles, courses, coding competitions, jobs and more.
  • ğŸ“š Learn to Program (â­4.4k) - Educational resources to learn to program.

Libraries / C

  • C: Cross-Platform

  • C: Entity Component System

  • C: File System
